DOC.brief_title: Effects Intense Exercise Neural Responses Food .
DOC.detailed_description: It clear intense exercise impact peripheral appetite regulation , however little known impact high-intensity exercise central appetite regulation . This study aim investigate effect high-intensity exercise central peripheral response image food . Functional magnetic resonance technique use assess brain response image high low calorie food , follow short bout high-intensity exercise . Appetite hormone concentration also measure . It hypothesize , due know effect high-intensity exercise appetite regulatory hormone subjective appetite rating , activation reward-related brain region visual food cue would modulate follow intense physical activity .
DOC.criteria: Healthy , nonsmoker , free cardiovascular disease metabolic disease , medication , participate moderate/vigorous physical activity ( > 2 hour per week ) Smokers , history cardiovascular/metabolic disease , low physical activity level , inability participate fMRI scan session include contraindication MRI
